titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that an individual who leaves employment because of sexual harassment or loss of child care will, for purposes of determining such individual's eligibility for unemployment compensation, be treated as having left such employment for good cause.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 2/13/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that an individual who leaves employment because of sexual harassment or the loss of child care will, for purposes of determining such individual's eligibility for unemployment compensation, be treated as having left such employment for good cause.
